description:
1,9 parses as 19 after file saving.

steps to reproduce:
1.Create new design file.
2.Open property sheet view.
3.Swith to master page view.
4.Select margin node, input 1,9in for left margin
5.Save file.
6.Open design file with text editor, the saved value is 1.9in, all right.
7.Open design file with designer
8.Swith to master page view.
9.The left margin value is 19in.
